text: CloudWatch dashboard Amazon RDS metrics 1.8. 20.1. 0.41. 0.23. @ CPUUtilization @ FreeStorageSpace @ WritelOPS @ ReadlOPS Amazon EC2 metrics Amazon EBS metrics Various units 5.62. 891 @ VolumeReadOps @ VolumeWriteOps 52.6 \ 0 16:30 16:45 17:00 17:15 @ NetworkPacketsin @ NetworkPacketsOut @ CPUUtilization The CloudWatch dashboard feature enables you to access all the metrics for your resources from a single location. For example, you can use a CloudWatch dashboard to monitor the CPU utilization of an Amazon EC2 instance, the total number of requests made to an Amazon S3 bucket, and more. You can even customize separate dashboards for different business purposes, applications, or resources.
